name: Petal Quest
description:
Petal Quest is an arcade-style side-scrolling brawler about a flower who must save her garden from being taken over by weeds. You can play with a gamepad or keyboard.

Get the free demo now! The demo contains the first stage of the game. The full game will be available to purchase in early May, 2015.

Petal Quest is the first game developed by Jen Ný of Nýbiru Studio.

Update: A new demo featuring special moves is now available!
